Deviantartist with a name that takes our minds on a tour of the old

Italian masters created this 3D render of a booster lifting off from the

surface of Kerbin. The smoke effects especially are quite impressive.<br/></a></p><p><a href="http://michawlo.deviantart.com/art/KSP-Booster-rocket-at-launch-537386290">Source: http://michawlo.deviantart.com/art/KSP-Booster-rocket-at-launch-537386290</a><br/></p>

That's quite good!

I wonder if this guy's on the forums...
